unnormalised: Distributed Denial of Service (DDOS) attack mhonnge ek torechi cyberattack zantun ekach systemacher dhyan kendrit korunk ani tanka traffic diun bhurun tankam vaiz legitimate vaparnarank mellonam korunk anek bigddail'le systems vapartat. Hacho vichar internet highwaycher traffic jam asa mhunn. Thoddea gaddian karann zalea bodal, tumchea lagim hazar, even lakhon systems ekach serverak ekach velar data requests dhaddtat. Udaharonnak, Flipkart.com sarkem ek lokpriy e-commerce siteacher 15/08acher sale vellar dhyan kendrit korunk zata, ani ti crash zatali.
normalised: A Distributed Denial of Service (D-D-O-S) attack mhunnttlear ek torechi cyberattack zantunt ekuch systemacher dhados korunk ani trafficant buddonk ani zayz upayogkartteank mellonk divonk nhoi mhonnunk anek compromize kel'lea systemancho upayog kortat. Internet highwaycher traffic jam asa mhonn chintat. Thoddea gaddieank lagun rukavot na, tumkam hazaramni, lakhonni system ekuch serverak data request pachoita ekuch velar. Udharonnak, Flipkart dot com vori lokpriya e-commerce siteak pandravade Augustachea vellar salevellar target korunk zata ani crash korun diunk zata.

unnormalised: Bigddail'le systems, zankam "bots" vo "zombies" mhunntat, ek botnet toiar kortat, jem attack korpeachea tabeant asta. Attack korpi botnetak suchona dhaddta, taka target serveracher requests diun bhurun tankam dixa dita. Trafficachi matra itli vhodd asta ki server taka sambhallonk somorth nasta, ani tenna service deny zata. Common targets mhonnlear websites, online services, ani pura networks legit. 32 GB RAM aslolea serverak lagat ek DDOS attack asa tenna to turant javab dinam zatat.
normalised: Compromize kel'lea systemank 'bots' vo 'zombies' mhunnttat ani te attacker control kortat. Attacker botnetak suchna dhaddta ani target serveracher requestacho puro dhaddunk sangta. Traffic itlo vaddo asta ki serverak samballonk zainam ani service mellonk divonk zainam. Lokpriya targetancho aspavo websites, online service, ani entire networks asta. Thirty two gigabyte R-A-M aslolea serverak D-D-O-S attackak lagun chodd unresponse mellta.

unnormalised: DDOS attacksan veg-veglleo teknik vapartat, zantun UDP floods, SYN floods, ani HTTP floods aspavtat. UDP floods User Datagram Protocol packets diun target bharta. SYN floods TCP handshake processacho faido gheta. HTTP floods zaite legitimate HTTP requests diun targetacher bom bardta. Attack korpi LOIC vo HOIC sarkhim tools vaprunk xakta, vo underground forumsan pasun botnet services kirayen gheunk xakta sumar $100 prati vorak.
normalised: U-D-P floods, S-Y-N floods, ani H-T-T-P floods torekani D-D-O-S attack kortat. U-D-P floods targetacher User Datagram Protocol packetanche puro dhaddtat. S-Y-N floods T-C-P handshake processacher faido kaddtat. H-T-T-P floods targetacher zayz H-T-T-P requestache puro dhaddtat. Attacker L-O-I-C vo H-O-I-C vorim toole vaprunk zata vo botnet service underground forumantlean rentak gheunk zata, lagbhag dollar hundred per hour.

unnormalised: Mitigationan veg-vegllea defense mechanismsacho vapor aspavta, zoxe firewalls, intrusion detection systems, ani content delivery networks (CDNs). He solutions kharab traffic filt'tor korunk ani anek serversacher load vanttank maddat kortat. Cloudflare, udaharonnak, DDOS protection services dita. Security software velear velar update korunk ani network traffican asvabhavik zalear dekhrek korunk legit important. Nimannent, internet terms "DDOS attack" sarkhi vicharnni samzunk ajchea digital yugant important, khas korun ti businessank zanchi online presence ani mellpavnnacher dhyan asta.
normalised: Mitigationant firewall, intrusion detection systems, ani content delivery networks (C-D-N-s) vorim defense mechanism vaportat. Hea solutions malicious traffic filter korunk ani load anek serveracher banttunk maddot kortat. Cloudflare D-D-O-S protection service dita. Security software regularly update korunk ani network traffic anomalies aslear nhespun korunk chodd mhotvache. Nimannek, internetachea utrank 'D-D-O-S attack' mhonn dhyan divop chodd mhotvachem, khas korun dhondeak zanchem online presence ani availabilitycher dhyan asta.
